member.name: T:IntelliFactory.Core.FastInvoke
member.summary: Splits invocation of methods represented as `System.Reflection.MethodInfo` into the static and dynamic phase, doing the binding work at the static phase. A pre-bound method can be 100-1000x faster to invoke compared to using `.Invoke` every time, which has to repeatedly do method binding.

A utility method to update `Parameters` in a conforming object.

member.summary: Extends the map with the given overrides.

member.name: M:IntelliFactory.Core.Parametrization.Parameters.Default
member.summary: Constructs the default parameters, the empty map. Looking up parameter values from `Parameters.Default` will invoke parameter default value construction recipes.

member.name: T:IntelliFactory.Core.Parametrization.Parameters
member.summary: Represents a collection of parameter values. Logically is a partial map from parameter objects to values of the corresponding type. Parameters may be passed explicitly or implicitly through the `System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.CallContext`.

member.summary:
Functionally updates the current value of the parameter in an object that supports parameterization.
p.Update f ps = p.Custom (f (p.Find ps)) ps

member.name: M:IntelliFactory.Core.Parametrization.Parameter`1.FromCallContext
member.summary: Looks up the current value from `System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.CallContext`.

member.summary: Finds the current value of the parameter in an object that supports parameterization.

member.name: M:IntelliFactory.Core.Parametrization.Parameter`1.Custom``1(`0,IntelliFactory.Core.Parametrization.IParametric{``0})
member.summary: Functionally updates the current value of the parameter to the given value in an object that supports parameterization.

member.name: T:IntelliFactory.Core.Parametrization.Parameter`1
member.summary: Represents a first-class configurable parameter, a typed generalization of environment variables. Parameter sets are passed through opaque dictionaries of `Parameters` type. Represented as an auto-generated unique key combined with a recipe to construct a default value.

member.name: T:IntelliFactory.Core.Parametrization

member.name: M:IntelliFactory.Core.TextPipes.TextPipe.Create(Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpOption{IntelliFactory.Core.TextPipes.NonBlockingTextWriterConfig})
member.summary: Creates a new text pipe. Parameters configure the `NonBlockingTextWriter`.

member.name: M:IntelliFactory.Core.TextPipes.TextPipe.Close
member.summary: Closes the pipe. All queued readers receive empty results.

member.name: T:IntelliFactory.Core.TextPipes.TextPipe
member.summary: Thread-safe text pipe with two ends - a reader and a writer. Writes are non-blocking, the pipe accumulates without bounds. Reads "block" by queuing continuations in the pipe. Asynchronous reads are preferred, as they involve more efficient continuation representations: waiting async readers use less memory than blocking readers.

member.name: M:IntelliFactory.Core.TextPipes.NonBlockingTextWriter.Create(Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpFunc{System.String,Microsoft.FSharp.Core.Unit},Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpOption{IntelliFactory.Core.TextPipes.NonBlockingTextWriterConfig})
member.summary: Constructs a new writer that does not block when written to. Continuation is invoked in a single-threaded manner. It should not block or raise exceptions. All strings passed to the continuation are non-null and non-empty. An empty string signals that the writer is closed.

member.name: T:IntelliFactory.Core.TextPipes.NonBlockingTextWriter
member.summary: Implements writing as message-passing. Writers created with this class are thread-safe.

member.name: F:IntelliFactory.Core.TextPipes.NonBlockingTextWriterConfig.NewLine
member.summary: The newline string to use. Defaults to "\n" for symmetry with `ReadLine` implementation on `TextReader`.

member.name: F:IntelliFactory.Core.TextPipes.NonBlockingTextWriterConfig.FlushInterval
member.summary: The interval at which the internal timer fires to flush the buffer. Defaults to 1 second.

member.name: F:IntelliFactory.Core.TextPipes.NonBlockingTextWriterConfig.Encoding
member.summary: Encoding used in `TextWriter.Encoding` - informational use only.

member.name: T:IntelliFactory.Core.VisualStudioTools.Extensions
member.summary: Provides a facility to generate VisualStudio extension `.vsix` files using the 2010 VSIX format compatible with VisualStudio 2010 and VisualStudio 2012, see <http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/vstudio/dd393754(v=vs.100).aspx> Quickstart: use the static methods on `VsixFile` to construct an in-memory `.vsix` representation you can then manipulate.

member.name: T:IntelliFactory.Core.VisualStudioTools.Templates
member.summary: Provides a facility to generate VisualStudio template archive files. These typically have a `.zip` extension and contain `.vstemplate` XML manifests. Quickstart: use the static methods on `Archive` to construct an in-memory `.zip` representation you can then manipulate.
